usecases: Track habits with stats and notes
Share habits with friends to track together
solutions: Auto tracking of various activities powered by Apple Health
Tracking both good habits and quitting bad habits
Goal units tracking with volume and units

Detailed stats and habit reports
Mood tracking for mental wellness
Customizable reminders and repeated reminders

Daily words for motivation

Compete with friends
Dark mode

habit_trackers.name: Habit Journal
usecases: Tracking daily, weekly, and monthly habits
Building new habits or maintaining existing ones
Motivating and reminding users to act on their habits
solutions: Provides habit tracker templates for each month
Encourages tracking small, easy-to-complete habits
Helps users visualize and record their habit streaks
key_features: Provides habit tracker templates for each month
Helps users visualize and record their habit streaks

habit_tracker_products.name: Habit Tracker - Habit Diary
habit_tracker_products.description: Habit Tracker - Habit Diary is designed to help users break bad habits and build good ones through customizable daily habits, 30-day challenges, time management, statistics tracking, and multitype to-do lists. It aims to motivate users to maintain a healthy and productive lifestyle.
usecases: Breaking bad habits and building good ones
Improving sleep quality and energy levels
habit_tracker_products.solutions: The app provides customizable habit plans and to-do lists, detailed statistics for progress tracking, built-in timer and white noises for focus and productivity, and 30-day challenges based on a scientifically proven habit-building method.

www.notion.so.solutions: Notion offers solutions for various team sizes and functions, including enterprise, small business, and personal use. It is also tailored for remote work, startups, education, and nonprofits.
key_features: Template gallerySetups to get you started
Customer storiesSee how teams use Notion

Habitify.solutions: Personalized habit tracker app to organize, execute, and triumph in daily routines and goals. It offers insightful metrics, challenges, and innovative tools for habit mastery.

key_features.Organized Schedule: Clear, organized schedule for the day
key_features.Challenges: Engage in friendly competitions and monthly challenges
key_features.Innovative Tools: Built-in timer, notes, mood tracking, privacy lock, health data sync, API access, integration with Apple Calendar, Zapier, and IFTT
key_features.Success Stories: Testimonials from users in various fields

www.dailyhabits.xyz.solutions: Helping users achieve their full potential by tracking and visualizing their habits, promoting self-awareness and reflection, and providing a simple and flexible habit tracking experience.
key_features: Visualize entire month at a glance with calendar view
Set flexible goals instead of streaks
Make notes to reflect on the habit journey
